DataElement.preferredName: Atrasentan Hydrochloride Placebo Agent Discontinued Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date Atrasentan Hydrochloride or placebo, as blinded treatment arm, was discontinued.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the discontinuation of Atrasentan Hydrochloride, the orally available hydrochloride salt of pyrrolidine-3-carboxylic acid with potential antineoplastic activity, or placebo.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The orally available hydrochloride salt of pyrrolidine-3-carboxylic acid with potential antineoplastic activity.  As a selective antagonist of the endothelin-A (ETA) receptor, atrasentan binds selectively to the ETA receptor, which may result in inhibition of endothelin-induced angiogenesis and tumor cell proliferation.:An inactive substance, treatment or procedure that is intended to mimic as closely as possible a therapy in a clinical trial.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: The orally available hydrochloride salt of pyrrolidine-3-carboxylic acid with potential antineoplastic activity.  As a selective antagonist of the endothelin-A (ETA) receptor, atrasentan binds selectively to the ETA receptor, which may result in inhibition of endothelin-induced angiogenesis and tumor cell proliferation.
An inactive substance, treatment or procedure that is intended to provide baseline measurements for the experimental protocol of a clinical trial.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Date of discontinuation of bl
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of discontinuation of blinded treatment
